Class-Monk 20 -- Female Half-Orc Monk: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 20 (+5) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 55
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Incredible Movement: +30 Speed in no armor
Wall Run: May Stride on vertical surfaces
Water Step: May Stride across liquids

General Feats: 5 selections

Monk Feats: 11 selections
Path To Perfection: 3 selections
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Adopted Ancestry: May take ancestry feats from chosen ancestry
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Ride: Command an Animal to move automatically succeeds/Mount acts on self turn
Timeless Body: Does not age
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)

Assurance (Gnome Lore): May take 10 on Gnome Lore rolls
Crane Stance: Unarmored stance gives -5 jump DC and +2'/+5' vertical/horizontal Leap
Dancing Leaf: +5' Jump and Leap/Takes no damage from falling when adjacent to a wall
Group Impression: May use Diplomacy to Make an Impression with 2 targets
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Tongue Of Sun And Moon: Can speak and understand all spoken languages
Combat
Hit Points: 308 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity; legendary) Class DC: Monk: 41 (dexterity; master)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+31 1d4+4 P R20'); Fist (+31 1d6+4 B); Sling (+31 1d6+2 B R50'); Staff (+30 1d4+4 B [2h d8])
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Expert Strikes: Weapon Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Graceful Legend: Armor Legendary (Unarmored Defense)/Class Master (Monk)
Graceful Mastery: Armor Master (Unarmored Defense)
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Ironblood Surge: Ironblood Stance resistance increases to 4
Master Strikes: Weapon Master (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Monastic Weaponry: Weapon Master (Monk Weapons)
Monk Expertise: Class Expert (Monk)
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Powerful Fist: Fists inflict 1d6 HP damage
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Expertise: Weapon Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Unconventional Weaponry: Weapon Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Adamantine Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as adamantine
Arrow Snatching: After a successful Deflect Arrow, may use the projectile to make an immediate ranged Strike
Brawling Focus: May use the critical specialization effects of trained monk weapons and brawling weapons
Crane Flutter: While in Crane Stance, may use a Reaction to gain +3 Armor Class; a missed melee attack allows an immediate -2 Strike
Crane Stance: Unarmored stance gives +1 Armor Class and restricts attacks to 1d6B HP unarmed hand attacks
Crushing Grab: May inflict 4B HP, lethal or non-lethal, with a successful Grapple
Deflect Arrow: May use a Reaction to gain +4 Armor Class vs. a physical ranged attack
Diamond Fists: Unarmed attacks gain the forceful trait or increase damage by 1 die step
Disrupt Ki: May use 2 actions to inflict 3d6 HP persistent negative damage and enfeebled 1 with an unarmed Strike
Dragon Roar: R15' Bellowing while in Dragon Stance inflicts frightened 1 on foes 1/1d4 rd (DC 26 Will neg; critical failure inflicts frightened 2); first successful attack in the next rd on a frightened foe inflicts +4 HP
Dragon Stance: Unarmored stance allows leg attacks that inflict 1d10B HP and ignoring first square of difficult terrain when Striding
Enduring Quickness: May use an additional action each rd to Stride, Leap, or Jump
Flurry Of Blows: May use 1 action to make 2 unarmed Strikes 1/tn
Flurry Of Maneuvers: May use Flurry Of Blows to Grapple, Shove, or Trip
Flying Kick: May use 2 actions to Strike a foe at the end of a Leap or Jump
Fuse Stance: Has merged two known stances into a unique new stance that grants the effects of both
Guarded Movement: +4 Armor Class vs. movement reactions
Impossible Technique: May use a Reaction to force a foe reroll on a hit or to gain a reroll on a failed save
Improved Knockback: Successful Shove moves 5' (critical success 10') and allows following; pushing into an obstacle inflicts 10B HP
Ironblood Stance: Unarmored stance allows unarmed attacks that inflict 1d8B HP and gives resistance 5 to all damage
Ironblood Surge: When in Ironblood Stance, may gain +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Knockback Strike: May use 2 actions to Shove 5' with a successful unarmed attack
Master Of Many Styles: May enter a stance at the beginning of a turn as a free action
Metal Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as cold iron and silver
Mixed Maneuver: May use 2 actions to attempt 2 choices of Grapple, Shove, and Trip simultaneously
Mountain Quake: R20' Stomp inflicts 4 HP and fall prone (DC 41 Fort HP only) 1/1d4 rd
Mountain Stance: Unarmored stance gives +1 Armor Class, +2 vs. Shove and Trip, and -5 Speed and restricts attacks to 1d8B HP unarmed hand attacks
Mountain Stronghold: While in Mountain Stance, may gain +2 Armor Class for 1 rd
Mystic Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Perfected Form: Rolls of less than 10 on first Strike each tn are treated as 10s
Powerful Fist: Suffers no attack penalty for inflicting lethal damage with unarmed attacks
Shattering Strike: May use 2 actions for an unarmed Strike that bypasses target resistances and ignores half of target's Hardness
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Sleeper Hold: A successful Grapple allows inflicting clumsy 1 for 1 tn (critical success inflicts unconscious for 1 min)
Stance Savant: May enter a stance during initiative
Stand Still: May use a Reaction to Strike an adjacent moving foe
Stunning Fist: May inflict stunned 1 with a successful Flurry Of Blows (DC 41 Fortitude neg; critical failure inflicts stunned 3)
Swift River: May end one speed status penalty or condition at end of each turn as a free action
Tangled Forest Rake: May move target 5' into a space within reach with a successful Tangled Forest Stance Strike
Tangled Forest Stance: Unarmored stance allows unarmed attacks that inflict 1d8S HP and prevents foes from moving away (DC 41 Reflex, Acrobatics, or Athletics neg)
Tiger Slash: While in Tiger Stance, may use 2 actions to inflict +3 damage dice and a 5' push; critical success inflicts +4 HP persistent bleed damage
Tiger Stance: Unarmored stance allows 10' Steps and unarmed hand attacks that inflict 1d8S HP, plus 1d4 HP persistent bleed damage on critical success
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Whirling Throw: A successful Athletics vs. a grabbed or restrained foe's Fortitude DC allows throwing it 30'
Wild Winds Gust: May use 2 actions to make a Wild Winds Stance Strike against all creatures in a 30' cone or 60' line
Winding Flow: May use 1 action to perform 2 choices of Stand, Step, and Stride
Wolf Drag: While in Wolf Stance, may use 2 actions to inflict d12P HP and knocked prone
Wolf Stance: Unarmored stance allows unarmed hand attacks that inflict 1d8P HP, with the trip trait when flanking
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +31 (dexterity; master); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Master (Reflex)
Path To Perfection (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Path To Perfection (Reflex): Save Master (Reflex)
Path To Perfection (Will): Save Master (Will)
Diamond Soul: +1 vs. magic
Enlightened Presence: R15' Self and allies gain +2 Will vs. mental effects
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Path To Perfection (Fortitude): Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Path To Perfection (Reflex): Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Path To Perfection (Will): Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Timeless Body: +2 vs. poisons and diseases/Resistance 10 to poison damage
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Focus Points: 9 Attack: Divine: 26; Occult: 30 Spell DC: Divine: 34; Occult: 38
Magic Notes:
Abundant Step: Knows Abundant Step spell/+1 Focus Points
Empty Body: Knows Empty Body spell/+1 Focus Points
Graceful Legend: Spell Master (Occult)
Ki Blast: Knows Ki Blast spell/+1 Focus Points
Ki Rush: Knows Ki Rush spell/Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point
Ki Strike: Knows Ki Strike spell/Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point
Ki Tradition (Divine): Spell Trained (Divine)
Ki Tradition (Occult): Spell Trained (Occult)
Monk Expertise: Spell Expert (Occult)
Quivering Palm: Knows Quivering Palm spell/+1 Focus Points
Wholeness Of Body: Knows Wholeness Of Body spell/+1 Focus Points
Wild Winds Initiate: Knows Wild Winds Stance spell/+1 Focus Points
Wind Jump: Knows Wind Jump spell/+1 Focus Points
Elemental Fist: May inflict electricity, bludgeoning, fire, or cold damage with Ki Strike
Ki Tradition (Divine): May learn spells from the Divine tradition
Ki Tradition (Occult): May learn spells from the Occult tradition
Meditative Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Meditative Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 13 available vs. 60 allocated
